dcterms:description: The SQuAD 1.1 dataset is used for question generation, providing a set of questions based on passages and their corresponding answers.
dcterms:title: SQuAD 1.1

dcterms:description: The Wizard of Wikipedia (WoW) dataset is used for knowledge-grounded dialog, where the model extracts important concepts from provided knowledge.
dcterms:title: Wizard of Wikipedia (WoW)

dcterms:creator: Courtney Napoles
Matthew R Gormley
Benjamin Van Durme
dcterms:description: The English Gigaword dataset is used for headline generation, providing a large corpus of news articles for training models to generate concise headlines.
dcterms:title: English Gigaword

dcterms:description: The CNN/Daily Mail dataset is used for abstractive summarization, consisting of news articles and their corresponding summaries.
dcterms:title: CNN/Daily Mail

dcterms:creator: Shashi Narayan
Shay B. Cohen
Mirella Lapata
dcterms:description: The XSum dataset is used for extreme summarization, focusing on generating single-sentence summaries from news articles.
dcterms:title: XSum
